nodes.text: Mahtee Dunn was a Rodian female who was the mother of a Force-sensitive named Wee Dunn.

After obtaining the Kyber memory crystal, bounty hunter Cad Bane, acting under the orders of Darth Sidious, infiltrated Mahtee's home in Kay-Tap square on Rodia to take Wee to Mustafar to further the Sith plot against the Jedi Order. Although Mahtee was hesitant to relinquish Wee, she was hypnotized by Bane and the child was taken from her. When a true Jedi Master, Obi-Wan Kenobi, arrived in an attempt to stop Bane, Mahtee attempted to attack him, believing Bane's lie that Kenobi was a false Jedi out to kidnap her child. Although Kenobi pursued Bane to his ship, Wee was already on his way to Mustafar. Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, working with his Padawan Ahsoka Tano, were later able to deduce the location of the captured children and infiltrated Sidious' Mustafar base, rescuing Wee from the Sith's clutches and accepting him into the Jedi Order for the time being.
Mahtee was voiced by Jameelah McMillan.
